404.user_description: This username doesn't belong to any user!

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: Something happened in the server that prevents you from viewing this page.

noscript.title: Please enable JavaScript!
noscript.subtitle: Without it, this site won't work!
noscript.tutorial_ff: On Firefox, go to %u and set "%k" to "%v"
noscript.tutorial_chrome: On Chrome, go to %u and add this website to the "Allowed to use JavaScript" list

generic.try_again: Try again in a few moments...

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.badge_manage_empty: Somehow there are no existing badges. This shouldn't happen.
admin.badge_manage_add_protected: Cannot set that badge as it is done automatically
admin.badge_manage_remove_protected: Cannot remove that badge as it is done automatically
admin.badge_create_invalid_data_size: Badge data must be between 1 and 65536 characters in length
admin.badge_create_success: Reload for your changes to apply.
admin.badge_invalid_name_size: Badge name must be between 1 and 64 characters in length
admin.badge_invalid_name: Badge name can only contain a-z, 0-9, and underscores
admin.badge_not_found: A badge with the name '%s' doesn't exist!
admin.modify_invalid_bio_size: User bio is too long! It should be between 0 and 65536 characters.
admin.modify_invalid_display_name_long: Display name is too long! It should be between 1 and 300 characters.
admin.modify_invalid_display_name_short: Display name is too short! It should be between 1 and 300 characters.

home.title: Home
home.quote_blocked: This post is from an account you've blocked
home.quote_private: This person limits who can view their profile
quote_placeholders: What did they do this time?
Yet another mistake to point out?

account.no_new: This instance isn't accepting any new users.
account.log_out_description: If you don't get redirected soon, click here...
account.invalid_username_chars: Username can only use A-Z, 0-9, underscores, and hyphens
account.invalid_username_length: Username must be between 1 and %s characters in length.
account.follow_blocking: You can't follow an account you're blocking!
account.block_self: Huh? Look, I get you hate yourself, but I can't let you do that.

messages.title: Messaging %s
messages.input_placeholder: What would you like to tell %s?
messages.yourself: Look, a lack of friends is a common issue, but you can't talk to yourself!
messages.blocked: You are blocked by this person!
messages.blocking_blocked: You are blocked by/blocking this user

post_page.comment_input_placeholder: Got something to say about this?

post.invalid_length: Invalid post length. Must be between 1 and %s characters.
post.invalid_comment_id: Idk your id is not right at all
post.invalid_quote_post: The post you're quoting doesn't exist!
post.invalid_quote_comment: The comment you're quoting doesn't exist!
post.invalid_username: Username is insvalagaeg... LOOK JUST SHUT UP
post.invalid_poll: The poll needs to have at least two options!

settings.title: Settings
settings.username_load_failure: Username couldn't be loaded! Try reloading the page?
settings.unload: You have unsaved changes! Are you sure you want to leave?
settings.profile_display_name_invalid_length: Invalid name length. Must be between 1 and %s characters
settings.profile_pronouns_invalid: Invalid pronoun string '%s'. If this is a bug, please report this
settings.profile_private_description: If your account is private, that means only you and people you follow can see your posts.
settings.cosmetic_theme_invalid: That's not a vailid theme, idiot.
settings.cosmetic_example_post_content: This is an example post. I am @example.
settings.account_password_failure: Unable to set your password! Reason: %s
settings.account_switcher_remove_error: You can't remove the account you're currently signed into!

user_page.private_warning: This account is private. Only users that they follow can see their posts.

credits.title: Credits
credits: Some icons are from Font Awesome

verify.confirmation: The email %e has been verified for the account %u.

remove.confirmation: The email %e has been removed from the account %u.

reset.title: Password Reset Requested for %u
reset.block_1: You seem to have requested to reset your password, and you received this email because it was linked to the account "%u". In order to do that, please go to %l. %h(If the link doesn't work, try copying this link and pasting it into your browser: %L)%H
reset.block_2: If you didn't request for your password to be reset, feel free to ignore this email. If anyone asks you for the link, %rDO NOT SHARE IT.%R It will give them the ability to reset your password for you, which would basically lock you out of your account.
reset.block_3: If this is not your account, please go to %l to remove this email from the account "%u". %h(If the link doesn't work, try copying this link and pasting it into your browser: %L)%H

v0.11.0.1: Added changelogs for all legacy versions
v0.11.0.2: Fixed an issue that caused read notifications/messages to not be colored grey

v0.10.1.1: Added a credits page (and a backend toggle)
v0.10.1.2: Deleting a post deletes any notifications caused by said post to prevent certain issues
v0.10.1.3: Pinging someone from a quote now works properly
v0.10.1.4: Creating a quote no longer reloads the timeline
v0.10.1.6: Added an option backend to set the default global theme
v0.10.1.7: Added optional content warnings for posts
v0.10.1.8: Completely rewrote how backend settings are managed
v0.10.1.9: Added a 'View poll results' button on polls you haven't yet voted on
v0.10.1.10: Rewrote CSS using the nesting feature

v0.10.0.1: Reverted tweaks to post box heights from v0.7.3
v0.10.0.3: Fixed a bug that caused some errors not appearing when quoting a post
v0.10.0.4: Added an option to the backend to automatically post to webhooks for a specified user
v0.10.0.5: Added several options to the backend to disable features such as the changelog and contact pages, pinned posts, the account switcher, polls, viewing content while logged out, and creating new accounts

v0.9.3.2: Completely remade how changelogs are stored
v0.9.3.3: Fixed a bug that made you not be able to view certain pages while logged out

v0.9.2.2: Added option backend to disallow scraping
v0.9.2.3: Added an animation when liking a post
v0.9.2.4: Added buttons to pages that previously didn't have them, like on the 404 page
v0.9.2.5: Added links to the changelog and contact pages in settings

v0.9.1.1: Added an option to cache languages
v0.9.1.2: Badge names can now use the letter "w"
v0.9.1.3: The server no longer errors when trying to log in to an account that doesn't exist
v0.9.1.4: The maxlength parameter is properly set on the username section on sign up and log in pages
v0.9.1.6: Buttons on posts on the notifications page function properly

v0.9.0.1: Added support for multiple languages (currently there's only English US/UK and Esperanto created by Subroutine)

v0.8.6.1: Added a fake profile picture next to your name. This is based off of your banner color

v0.8.4.1: Fixed an issue with the "hitboxes" of certain links on user pages
v0.8.4.2: Added a lot of feature disabling options in the backend settings config

v0.8.3.1: Clicking the refresh button quickly no longer loads duplicate posts
v0.8.3.2: Max line limit on quotes is smaller
v0.8.3.3: Added unsaved changes alert to settings page
v0.8.3.4: Added text to title to signify unread notifications

v0.8.2.1: Fixed an issue with the text color of timestamps on message pages

v0.8.1.1: The lock icon on private accounts on /u/... pages is properly styled
v0.8.1.2: @ mentions in messages no longer break everything
v0.8.1.3: The link color in messages you send has been changed to make them visible

v0.7.4.1: You can now pin one of your posts to your profile. This makes it show up before all of your other posts
v0.7.4.2: The delete and unpin buttons are both colored red by default. In the future, there may be a setting to disable this

v0.7.3.2: Links on posts now open in new tab
v0.7.3.4: Changed the placeholder text on post boxes
v0.7.3.5: Remade the top section of the post that has user info
v0.7.3.6: Made quote and like buttons not work when logged out

v0.7.2.1: Added an extra parameter to urls to hopefully prevent any unwanted caching between versions

v0.7.1.1: Fixed the description on embeds for user profiles and added follower counts to it too

v0.7.0.1: Added notifications. These are triggered when you @ someone, when you comment on someone else's post, or when you quote someone else's post
v0.7.0.2: You can view the post that a comment was commented on now via the link
v0.7.0.3: Pressing enter on the log in and sign up pages submits the form now

v0.6.8.2: The save button in settings stands out more
v0.6.8.3: Post stats are now shown in embeds
v0.6.8.4: Delete buttons now show on focused posts

v0.6.7.3: Added a new theme with a black base instead of a dark blueish color

v0.6.6.1: Fixed a small oversight with blocking that still showed quoted posts from blocked accounts

v0.6.5.2: Slight modification to post input boxes
v0.6.5.3: Delete button on smaller screens should no longer wrap to the next line

v0.6.4.1: Added caching for getting post lists to improve performance

v0.6.3.1: You can now view who someone follows and who follows them by clicking on the followers/following text on their profile

v0.6.2.1: Sending a request to create a badge that already exists now updates the svg content instead of 400-ing

v0.6.1.1: Creating/deleting badges no longer requires a server restart to update frontend

v0.5.2.2: Changed a couple variable and function names in the backend

v0.5.1.1: Made the input box for posting/commenting/quoting a lot better to work with

v0.4.3.1: Added documentation to the whole backend

v0.4.2.3: Some small bugs have been fixed

v0.4.1.2: Added a shadow behind usernames in profiles

v0.4.0.3: Added a confirm password box on the sign up page
v0.4.0.4: Random like counts on the settings page can no longer be zero
v0.4.0.5: The share button now has the correct cursor
v0.4.0.6: Added a border radius to posts in the settings page
v0.4.0.7: Quotation marks no longer show as &quo; on posts
v0.4.0.8: Added links to the home page on 404/500 pages
v0.4.0.9: The recent tab is now the default tab for the home timeline
v0.4.0.11: Remade all themes using the catppuccin color scheme
v0.4.0.12: Comments that have an id more than the most recent post can now load
v0.4.0.13: Added a width limit to private text info on the settings page
v0.4.0.14: The robots.txt file is now treated as plain text instead of html
v0.4.0.15: Links and pings can no longer conflict
v0.4.0.16: Static files are now served from /static/... by default
v0.4.0.17: Banners are now shown at 100% opacity

v0.3.8.1: Added a profile button on the sidebar

v0.3.6.1: Added a share button on some pages
v0.3.6.3: Posts now have a maximum line count on timelines

v0.3.5.1: Allows viewing user pages and posts when logged out
v0.3.5.2: Added embeds for users and posts

v0.3.4.1: Fixed a bug that caused the following count to include yourself
v0.3.4.2: Added settings to modify post/username/display name length, ratelimit timings, source code links, and posts per request

v0.3.3.1: Added follower/following counts to user pages

v0.3.2.2: Fonts no longer rely on Google Fonts
v0.3.2.3: Max display name length increased to 32 from 20
v0.3.2.4: Likes get properly filled in on user pages

v0.3.1.2: Fixed issues with loading a post causing a duplicate

v0.3.0.2: Extracted the backend into several files instead of one large file

v0.1.1.1: Fixed a couple bugs relating to escaping html

v0.1.0.2: Made banner color update when refreshing posts on a user profile

v0.0.9.2: Links in posts now turn into real links

v0.0.4.2: Added icons (home and settings, with settings currently not working)

v0.0.3.2: Added following and unfollowing without needing to manually edit the storage

v0.0.2.2: Added a following timeline (currently only shows your own posts unless you manually follow someone else)
